verses.verse: For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5484>reason<s%> I, <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> for the <S%G5228>sake<s%> of you <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> â€“
<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1065>indeed<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G3622>stewardship<s%> of God's <S%G5485>grace<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> to me for you;
that by <S%G602>revelation<s%> there was <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to me the <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> as I <S%G4270>wrote<s%> <S%G4270>before<s%> in <S%G3641>brief.<s%>
And by referring to <S%G3739>this,<s%> when you <S%G314>read<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> my <S%G4907>insight<s%> into the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> in <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%> was not <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> as it has <S%G3568>now<s%> been <S%G601>revealed<s%> to His <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

[to be specific], that the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> are <S%G4789>fellow<s%> <S%G4789>heirs<s%> and <S%G4954>fellow<s%> <S%G4954>members<s%> of the <S%G4954>body,<s%> and <S%G4830>fellow<s%> <S%G4830>partakers<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%>

of <S%G3739>which<s%> I was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of God's <S%G5485>grace<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> to me <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1753>working<s%> of His <S%G1411>power.<s%>

To me, the <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>least<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> was <S%G1325>given,<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> the <S%G421>unfathomable<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

and to <S%G5461>bring<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G3622>administration<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> which for <S%G165>ages<s%> has been <S%G613>hidden<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things;<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G4182>manifold<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> might <S%G3568>now<s%> be <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> to the <S%G746>rulers<s%> and the <S%G1849>authorities<s%> in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> [places.]
[This was] in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G165>eternal<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4160>carried<s%> out in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>
in <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> and <S%G4006>confident<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in Him.
<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G154>ask<s%> you not to <S%G7051>lose<s%> <S%G7051>heart<s%> at my <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> on your <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> for they are your <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5484>reason,<s%> I <S%G2578>bow<s%> my <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%>
from <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3965>family<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and on <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3687>derives<s%> its <S%G3687>name,<s%>

that He would <S%G1325>grant<s%> you, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to be <S%G2901>strengthened<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in the <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G444>man;<s%>

so that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> [and] that you, being <S%G4492>rooted<s%> and <S%G2311>grounded<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%>

may be <S%G1840>able<s%> to <S%G2638>comprehend<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4114>breadth<s%> and <S%G3372>length<s%> and <S%G5311>height<s%> and <S%G899>depth,<s%>

and to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> which <S%G5235>surpasses<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> that you may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> up to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to Him who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5238>exceeding<s%> <S%G5238>abundantly<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3539>think,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1411>power<s%> that <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> us,

to Him [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%> and in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
